answers.author: Sid Burgess
answers.text:
Chuck Marohn, who lives in MN would be a good start and Dan Burden has lots of experience if the corridor is going to have a pedestrian emphasis.

Sasaki and Associates (contact) Jason Hellendrung (617)970-3478 has strong experience for this type of work including in Charlotte NC, Cleveland Ohio and Cedar Rpaids Iowa.

author: Matthew Fulton
text: The City of West St Paul, MN is undertaking a $30,000,000 reconstruction of its major  transportation corridor which is predominantly developed with small to large retail commercial/service businesses.   We will be updating our development plans/guidelines and developing some overlay zoning regulations to guide future redevelopment and growth.  I am interested in sending the RFQ for doing this work to qualified planning firms with an excellent track record.   Any suggestions?
title: Corridor Planning Consultants
